original_text: One of your descendants may continue to serve me as a priest. But he will be very sad and his eyes will become weak. Anyone who is born in your family will die when they are young. One of your descendants may continue to serve me as a priest. But he will be very sad and his eyes will become weak. Anyone who is born in your family will die when they are young.
korean_text: 내 제단에서 내가 끊어 버리지 아니할 네 사람이 네 눈을 쇠잔하게 하고 네 마음을 슬프게 할 것이요 네 집에서 출산되는 모든 자가 젊어서 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: One of your descendants may continue to serve me
sentences.korean_translation: 네 후손 중 한 사람이 나를 계속 섬길 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: But he will be very sad
and his eyes will become weak
Anyone who is born in your family
will die when they are young
